<MethodEndpoint

This API allows you to query your LoginRadius Cloud Directory.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"apikey","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"LoginRadius API Key"},{"in":"query","name":"apisecret","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"LoginRadius API secret or LoginRadius API Secondary secret with Cloud Directory API permission enabled"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["from","to","q"],"properties":{"from":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The start date for the records you would like to retrieve (yyyy-mm-dd)","example":"2023-01-01"},"to":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The end date for the records you would like to retrieve (yyyy-mm-dd)","example":"2023-12-31"},"q":{"type":"object","description":"The query that you would like to pull data on"},"size":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":1000,"default":20,"description":"The number of records to be fetched per request"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
